description: Indigo resist-dyed skirt made from hand-spun yarns. The waistband and upper pleated band are solid blue while the lower pleated band of the skirt is patterned with five rings of hand-drawn designs including sawtooth and "Greek key" type patterns. Upper pleated band has decorative stitches to hold pleating in place.
